en_US: Teaching scenes, which have nothing to do with the original plot. You will learn the basic operations of the game in this scene, and will not proceed to the original story.
zh_CN: 教学用场景，与原剧情无关。你将在该剧情中了解到本游戏的基础操作，不会进行到原版剧情。

en_US: You are an unemployed young man with an ancestral apple orchard at home. To discover the secrets of your missing grandfather, you step into the dusty ruins.
zh_CN: 你是一名无业青年，家里有祖传的苹果园。为了探寻你失踪的爷爷的秘密，你踏入了那些尘封的废墟中。

en_US: You are a riot robot in White Canal City, and the management has been forced to remove your lethal weapon due to the opposition of the masses. Still, the prejudice from them against you remains undiminished. You've been sent to the pit room you don't know how many times, and today you're starting to think about whether or not to leave the city.
zh_CN: 你是白渠城中的一名制暴机器人，由于群众的反对管理层不得不撤下了你的致命性武器，尽管如此人们对你的偏见依旧不减。今天是你不知道第几次被送进维修室了，你开始思考要不要离开这座城市。
